game.name: Pillar of Salt
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The deity of this world has decided to destroy it in three days. His avatar awaits the world's champion at the top of the Mountain of Power. Can you build up your strength in time and reach the mountain in this unique real-time tactical roguelike RPG?
